Title: Enacts the "Lydia Soto law"
Summary: Establishes a Minority Coordinating Council on Asthmatic Affairs within the department of health to assess the asthma risk factors for the minority citizens of our state, counties and regions; identifies the existing barriers to quality asthma treatment and care among minorities; develops action steps for addressing care issues; launches a state-wide asthma awareness campaign to educate our citizens about the disease; requires report.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a Minority Coordinating Council on Asthmatic Affairs
